questions.body: (1) What is your first and last name? Reply to this message with your answer.
(2) Thank you! Next, send us a term or short phrase you would not expect a speech engine to recognize. It could a person, product, company, or your favorite movie character.
(3) Great. Reply with a second term or phrase. Our API lets you add up to 1,000 custom terms, but today we will use three.
(4) Almost there! Send us one last term or phrase. Make it a good one!
